title: Tradeify Check website
description: Tradeify, based in the United States, was established in April 2024. The firm is a futures provider that offers 1 Step program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $150,000. Tradable instruments include Futures with 1:1 leverage for majors, exotics, and cryptocurrencies. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Good Faith Policy: No exploiting price display/delays/technical errors.
Microscalping: 50%+ profit must come from trades > 10 seconds.

payout_policy.details: Growth: 90/10 split, 5 trading days min. Lightning: 90/10, no min days. Select Flex: 90/10, every 5 winning days. Tiered max payouts up to $25K (6th+).

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed with up to 5 accounts. Only personally owned accounts. Third-party copiers at own risk.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Bots/algorithms allowed with ownership proof. No HFT bots.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed. NEVER use DLL as stop loss during volatility.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: All positions auto-closed at market close.
forbidden_strategies: Good Faith Policy: No exploiting price display/delays/technical errors.
Microscalping: 50%+ profit must come from trades > 10 seconds.

seo_content:
Tradeify Technical Infrastructure

Tradeify, based in the United States, was established in April 2024. The firm is a futures provider that offers 1 Step program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $150,000. Tradable instruments include Futures with 1:1 leverage for majors, exotics, and cryptocurrencies. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
